General: Under an agreement between Singapore and Brunei Darussalam, the Brunei dollar (convertible at par) is also accepted as legal tender.

Source: Since 2007 Monetary Authority of Singapore Previously calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the following banks: December 2001 - December 2006 Deutsche Bank, Singapore Branch 1997 - November 2001 BHF-Bank, Singapore Branch 1989 - 1996 The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation, Singapore
